00186 class CPVUserInput: public HeapBase, public PVInterface
00187 {
00188     public:
00193         OSCL_IMPORT_REF CPVUserInput(): iRefCounter(1) {};
00194 
00198         virtual ~CPVUserInput() {};
00202         virtual PV2WayUserInputType GetType() = 0;
00203 
00204         // from PVInterface
00205         void addRef()
00206         {
00207             iRefCounter++;
00208         }
00209 
00210         void removeRef()
00211         {
00212             --iRefCounter;
00213             if (iRefCounter == 0)
00214                 OSCL_DELETE(this);
00215         }
00216 
00217     private:
00218 
00219         virtual bool queryInterface(const PVUuid& arUuid, PVInterface*& aprInterface)
00220         {
00221             OSCL_UNUSED_ARG(arUuid);
00222             OSCL_UNUSED_ARG(aprInterface);
00223             return false;
00224         }
00225 
00226         uint32 iRefCounter;
00227 
00228 };

00321 class CPVUserInputAlphanumeric : public CPVUserInput
00322 {
00323     public:
00333         OSCL_IMPORT_REF CPVUserInputAlphanumeric(uint8* apInput, uint16 aLen)
00334         {
00335             if (aLen)
00336             {
00337                 int err;
00338                 ipInput = OSCL_STATIC_CAST(uint8*, OSCL_MALLOC(aLen));
00339                 OSCL_TRY(err, oscl_memcpy(ipInput, apInput, aLen));
00340                 OSCL_FIRST_CATCH_ANY(err,
00341                                      OSCL_DELETE(ipInput);
00342                                      OSCL_LEAVE(OsclErrGeneral);
00343                                     );
00344                 iLength = aLen;
00345             }
00346         }
00347 
00351         OSCL_IMPORT_REF ~CPVUserInputAlphanumeric()
00352         {
00353             if (ipInput)
00354             {
00355                 OSCL_DELETE(ipInput);
00356             }
00357         }
00358 
00359         // from CPVUserInput
00360         OSCL_IMPORT_REF PV2WayUserInputType GetType()
00361         {
00362             return PV_ALPHANUMERIC;
00363         }
00364 
00370         OSCL_IMPORT_REF uint8* GetInput()
00371         {
00372             return ipInput;
00373         }
00374 
00380         OSCL_IMPORT_REF uint16 GetLength()
00381         {
00382             return iLength;
00383         }
00384 
00385     protected:
00389         uint8* ipInput;  /* We own the memory*/
00390         uint16 iLength; /* length of the string */
00391 };
